A B C D E G H I L M N O P R S T U V W

G

Game - Class in gameelements
Represents a running game, containing the game board, the game situation, and the two players and manages each turn by asking the current player for its next move and applying it to the game, until the game is stopped or the game is won by one player.
Game(GamePreferences) - Constructor for class gameelements.Game
Constructs a new game with the preferences set.
game - Variable in class player.Player
The game the player participates in.
gameBoard - Variable in class gameelements.Game
The current game board of the game.
GameBoard - Class in gameelements
Represents the layout of the game board used during the whole duration of a game.
GameBoard(int, int) - Constructor for class gameelements.GameBoard
Constructs a game board for the given dimensions.
gameBoard - Variable in class gameelements.GameSituation
The corresponding game board the game situation belongs to.
GameColor - Class in gameelements
This class represents the two existing colors used for players and game tokens.
gameelements - package gameelements
 
GamePanel - Class in gui
Panel which displays the game board and its game states and where all moves can be set via mouse click.
GamePanel(Game) - Constructor for class gui.GamePanel
Creates a game panel for a game.
GamePreferences - Class in gameelements
This class holds game preferences for the dimension of the board, types and names of the participating players, strategy settings, display options, and setup options for the board.
GameSituation - Class in gameelements
This class holds information about a certain game situation on a game board, like the number and color of game tokens in each field.
GameSituation(GameBoard, List<GameSituation.FieldSetup>) - Constructor for class gameelements.GameSituation
Constructs a game situation, either with predefined setup or with no tokens placed at all.
GameSituation.FieldSetup - Class in gameelements
Class that contains properties for setting up a field within a board at initialization, to present a preceded game situation.
GameSituation.FieldSetup() - Constructor for class gameelements.GameSituation.FieldSetup
 
GameTreeEvaluator - Class in ai
Evaluates a game situation by building up a game tree and examining the best possible move within the generated game tree, utilizing an alphabeta algorhithm and iterative tree search.
GameTreeEvaluator(Strategy) - Constructor for class ai.GameTreeEvaluator
Initiates an evaluator.
getActionPanel() - Method in class gui.MainFrame
Returns the main panel in which games are displayed.
getActivePlayer() - Method in class gameelements.Game
Returns the current active player.
getAnimationSpeed() - Method in class gameelements.GamePreferences
Returns the length of time in milliseconds between every update of the gui before showing a new board situation.
getAnimationSpeed() - Method in class gui.AnimationSpeedPanel
Returns the selected animation speed.
getAnimationSpeed() - Method in class gui.DisplayOptionsPanel
Returns the time that passes between every animation step in milliseconds.
getAnimator() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Returns the animator.
getBestPositions(List<EvaluablePosition>) - Method in class ai.Evaluator
Returns a list of the best evaluated positions, if more than one position with the highest evaluation value exist.
